originalText.text: First time visit: Came in with questions and a brief consultation. Excellent experience from calling in to book an appointment to the finish. Odeth and the rest of front desk was organized and welcoming. The office space is well kept, tidy and very comfortable. If you want to get your teeth fixed up for a better smile, Dr.Zarabi is absolutely the perfect doctor to go to. He was very helpful and informative with the questions and concerns I had. Honest with the patients and has the patient's best interests at heart. Thank you!

originalText.text:
Hi,

Staff is great especially Maria from reception area. She is always super helpful. New place is bigger. Only complaint is I would like to have more communication with dentist about where my son is with process.

originalText.text: From the time I walked in I was greeted warmly by the staff.  Every step of the way was carefully explained.  I was asked if I was okay and this really meant a lot because so many times, no one asks about your comfort.  Lastly, Wenifer was professional and considerate.  She really explained every step of the transaction to get me started with Invisalign.  I did not think that at almost 60 years old (in 2 months) I would have an opportunity to improve my smile.  I’m grateful to the entire staff.

originalText.text: Today at Strait Set Orthodontics was incredible! This is my first time back in a while and I’ve really missed this place . Wenifer is a great new addition to the office and made sure I understood everything that would be happening today. Everyone here is great. If you are the kind of person who gets nervous about getting ortho work done everyone here will put you at ease.

text.text: Today at Strait Set Orthodontics was incredible! This is my first time back in a while and I’ve really missed this place . Wenifer is a great new addition to the office and made sure I understood everything that would be happening today. Everyone here is great. originalText.text: I needed to book an ortho consultation for my son.  I found Straight Set through on-line research because it was one of the few places that took my insurance and was located close to home.  I was pleasantly surprised upon visiting the location for our appointment!  The office is a welcoming, state-of-the art facility that seemed to employe and cater to local people and families.  The receptionists, assistants, and doctor were all so kind, compassionate, and knowledgable.  They listened and explained things clearly.  This is gem in the neighborhood and I hope more people discover it.
